name: VoM - Telekinesis TEST
description:
Prototype scene used to test out and gather feedback on the Telekinesis ability.

GAMEPAD ONLY. There is currently no keyboard support for this.

Controls:

Aim - Hold Left Trigger and aim with Analog stick

Telekinesis - While aiming, hold East button on gamepad (B on Xbox, Circle on PS)

Move Enemies with Telekinesis - Use Analog stick to move enemies while holding Telekinesis button
